name: Time Crunch Post Jam
description:
Time Crunch

There is an evil space squid! Kill it!

Should you fail you will be sent back to the beginning but your past selves will join the fight. Just don't cause any paradoxes!

Jump with Space (or A or Left Bumper on an Xbox controller)

Shoot with Left mouse button (or X or Right Bumper on an Xbox controller)

Aim with the mouse (or the right stick on a controller)

Move with WASD (or D-pad or left stick on a controller)

Controller recommended!

Made with Godot. Programming by me. Tremendous thanks to the authors of the assets below.

I originally created this game for Ludum Dare 47 which you can find here: https://etmm.itch.io/time-crunch The version on this page has seen significant changes and improvements to the camera and controls.

Art: https://opengameart.org/content/warped-caves-pixel-art-pack

Sound effects: https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-sound-effects-library

Music (specifically the track "spacetime"): https://opengameart.org/content/free-music-pack
